name: Ultra Cosmo Invaders
description:
Ultra Cosmo Invaders is an arcade game based on the wildly popular retro space shooter, Galaga. Built upon a custom game engine CoffeeMaker, this is my first ever attempt at both a public video game release and game engine. UCI is a endless space shooter in which your goal is to destroy as many drones as possible with the given about lives you have. Your score, if it makes the top 3, will be saved after each session. Try to beat your best high score with every play through! 

This project is in public alpha release. This project will continue to receive updates.

Controls:

  • Left and Right arrows keys to move.
  • W - Warp Speed
  • Spacebar - Fire missiles
Sign up for the Newsletter!

If you wish to follow this project in more detail, please sign up for my newsletter at the Ultra Cosmo Invaders official website!
